label: Mild Illness Assessment
description: 15 minute consult for low acuity symptoms; priced for GST-only provinces (e.g., Alberta).

label: Neurology Consultation
description: 45 minute specialist visit focused on neurological concerns; Ontario private pay rate.

label: Pediatric Wellness Visit
description: 30 minute preventative care exam for pediatric patients; priced for GST/PST provinces.
